attributes.review: Worst app ever. Offensive content, uninformative, slow with many glitches... the list is endless. I would not recommend this app to anyone who wishes to be provided with useful and accurate information. It is horrible.
attributes.title: Why this app is the worst:

attributes.review: this  app completely destroyed my internet software. i mean i couldn’t use my phone for 4 days bc i downloaded this app. once i used the app i noticed that trump isn’t really dining anything. normally i support both ends. like i agree with some republican things and i agree with some democratic things but this app should be a hate page! it does not do home justice #tiktoksentmeherebevauseimapartofgenzandtiktokisbasicallymywholelifesoifyoubanituwilldie
attributes.title: glitch

attributes.review: This app gives off some serious bad vibes.😰I was outside when I opened the app, then it glitched and a tornado came out of no where and took my house away😣 a rock hit me in the head and I was unconscious🥴 then I woke up in the Wizard of Oz😯 and on top of all that my house landed on top of my grandma😪
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: I downloaded the app upon hearing about it from another source and am incredibly disappointed with the quality. Never going to download again. Take this app down now.
attributes.title: Absolutely disappointing. Don’t download.

attributes.review: Took 5 hours to upload and when I opened it it just showed an orange screen with the words “China is watching.” Shut down after one pics of factual evidence and won’t open up. It’s glitching and says it’s in “bunker mode”. Would not recommend.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: As soon I I downloaded the app I was  immediately asked if I had autism I clearly said no but then a video of Donald trump talking was plsued and now I can’t even function without my daily dose of Fox News. This app is by far the worst thing ever created.
